attributes.action: Stop Borris Johnson stop and search idea
attributes.additional_details: We need to stop Mr Borris Johnson from allowing police to have more power when it comes to stop and search. It's a fact that stop and search is  not effective at all. He needs to not pursue it lt.
attributes.background: I am a private investigator and a security specialist. Borrid johnson can not be allowed to give police more stop and search powers.
